page.title: 07KINGSTON HOSPITAL
page.content:
At the hospital we went to the childrens wards on level seven. We went to the schoolroom. The teachers were Susan Bailey and Frances Wademan. If you are in hospital for more than one week this would be your daily timetable:_ A 9 YEAR OLD'S TIMETABIE
TIME TYPE PERSON 7.00 Get up Nurse 7.30 Breakfast Tealady 8.00 Bath or wash Mother 8.30 Lessons Mrs. Bailey 9.00 Playroom Playroom Lady 11.45 Lunch Tea Lady 3.00 Snack Tea Lady 5.30 Supper Tea Lady 8.30 Light Out Nurse There is a Nurse on duty all night and a sister in charge of each ward. Parents can stay the night.
